metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8931 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Multiple integer overflows in the (1) get_time_t_max and (2) get_time_t_min functions in archive_read_support_format_mtree.c in libarchive before 3.2.0 allow remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted mtree file, which triggers undefined behavior.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8931` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2').
